title: Mazda Mega Carnival – Mazda 3 now from RM99,000
text:
Home » Cars » Mazda Mega Carnival – Mazda 3 now from RM99,000 Mazda Mega Carnival – Mazda 3 now from RM99,000 / 2 comments 
Over the next three weekends, official Mazda distributor Bermaz is holding a Mazda Mega Carnival that promises discounts on the Mazda 3 and CX-5 . The former can now be had from as low as RM99,000, around RM7,000 cheaper than the original retail price of the base GL sedan model. 
The company is also offering deals on its pre-owned vehicles, with prices starting from RM60,000. Those who visit their showrooms during these three weekends will also be able to participate in test drives and receive instant gifts when they sign up, as well as being in the running to win Mazda Bonanza Vouchers worth over RM300,000 in total. 
The first Mazda Mega Carnival will take place this weekend, March 25 and 26, at the Mazda Puchong showroom in Bandar Puteri. Then, it will move to Mazda Kajang on Jalan Semenyih and Mazda Shah Alam in Padang Jawa on April 1 and 2, before ending at Mazda Ampang along Jalan Ampang and Mazda Glenmarie on April 8 and 9.
